gobblin.kafka.writer

Class Kafka08DataWriter<D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.kafka.writer.Kafka08DataWriter<D>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncDataWriter<D>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class Kafka08DataWriter<D>
extends Object
implements AsyncDataWriter<D>
    Implementation of a Kafka writer that wraps a 0.8 KafkaProducer. This does not provide transactional / exactly-once semantics. Applications should expect data to be possibly written to Kafka even if the overall Gobblin job fails.
